text: Nayo niyo yakuye aba hakanye mu bantu bahawe igitabu c’Imana gitagatifu mu mazu yabo, mugihe c’ukwimuka kwabo kwa mbere, ntimwiketse yuko abo bantu bazovayo, nabo biketse yuko inzitiro zabo zizoba kingira ku Mana, mugabo Imana yabashikiye ahantu batizeye, n’ugushiraho ubwoba mu mitima yabo, baca baguma basenyura inzu zabo n’amaboko yabo, hamwe n’amaboko yaba Isilamu, rero mwebwe mufise amaso, nimutegere neza
